messages.subject: Ds' first web site
messages.msgSnippet: Alex has been asking to create his own web site, so I looked around and found Kid s Universe.  I helped him out with the typing and explained each of the six
messages.messageBody:
Alex has been asking to create his own web site, so I looked around and found
Kid's Universe. I helped him out with the typing and explained each of the
six steps, but other than that, it's all done by him. If you go there, please
take a moment to sign his guestbook. I know he would love that!
If you want to read the guestbook, type in alexander.
<A HREF="http://www.kidsuniverse.com/kidspages/spiderman.html">Web Page for
Alex</A>

Here's the link to the creator if you want to do this with your kids. It's
really cool!
<A HREF="http://www.kidsuniverse.com/freeweb.html">Kids Universe - the
Internet's Real Toy Store!</A>

Cheryl
Nicholas Academy Homeschooling Resources
http://nicholasacademy.homestead.com
